name: Necklace of Strahd
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution nicely.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
